title: Byzantine Greek Patristics & Mystical Theology
description: Complete collection of Greek Church Fathers from Patrologia Graeca, Byzantine historians, and hesychast mystical texts. Spans from Apostolic Fathers through Byzantine Empire, documenting the theological and philosophical foundations of Eastern Christianity.
curatedBy: Embassy of the Free Mind Collection

researchValue: This collection provides comprehensive access to Greek patristic theology and Byzantine spirituality. Essential for understanding Eastern Orthodox theology, the development of Christian doctrine, mystical theology, and the philosophical synthesis of Greek thought with Christianity. Includes both systematic theology and spiritual/mystical texts from the hesychast tradition.

connections.relationship: Pseudo-Dionysius as bridge between Neoplatonism and Christianity; influence on Ficino
Patristic natural law theory (Basil, John Chrysostom) influences medieval Scholasticism
